main event: Several people reported an unidentified object over Hereford, Texas on November 6, 1957, described as a bright meteor moving at a high speed.
interesting points: The object was observed moving from south to north at a terrific rate of speed., The sighting lasted for just 6 seconds., Witnesses described the object as brighter than usual for a meteor., A report from a nearby town, Levelland, mentioned a similar object seen behaving erratically., The object was estimated to be about the size of a basketball when observed from a vehicle.
witness description: several witnesses from Hereford and nearby areas
